body:
Comment 4: 
I have been looking into it; I do see where I *think* the problem is in installer.wxs
(and makerelease.go) but I'm still trying to get makerelease.exe to run cleanly on my
windows 8 box with the latest wix and msys/mingw running.  Any pointers to reproducing
the makerelease process?  I haven't finished trolling the docs yet :-/
